import { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; import Sidebar from "../../components/SidebarLearning"; import RightDetail from "../../components/RightDetail"; export default function Leaderboard() { const [users, setUsers] = useState([]); const [currentPage, setCurrentPage] = useState(1); const [itemsPerPage] = useState(5); const getUsers = async () => { const response = await axios.get(`http://localhost:5000/user`); setUsers(response.data); }; useEffect(() => { getUsers(); }, []); const handlePageChange = (page) => { setCurrentPage(page); }; const scoreUsers = users .filter((user) => user.id || user.name || user.score) .sort((a, b) => b.score - a.score) .slice(0, 10); const top10WinstreakUsers = users .filter((user) => user.id || user.name || user.winstreak) .sort((a, b) => b.winstreak - a.winstreak) .slice(0, 10); return (

Leaderboard

{/* Scores Leaderboard */}

Top 10 Scores Leaderboard

{scoreUsers.map((user, index) => ( ))}
No Name Scores
{index + 1} {user.name} {user.score}
{/* Wistreak Leaderboard */}

Top 10 Winstreak Leaderboard

{top10WinstreakUsers.map((user, index) => ( ))}
No Name Winstreak
{index + 1} {user.name} {user.winstreak}
); }
